Name: Purple Haze
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass. POUR liqueur down the inside of the glass. This will fall to the bottom and form a purple haze.
Review: A sweet and sour shot with a sweet, berry base.
Nutrition: One serving of Purple Haze contains 143 calories
